page.title: 05WE MAKE WHAT YOU NEED
page.content: { Trade "}We make what you need. " ------------------------------------- In the past,until about 30 years ago, most farm equipment was made from {wood.}For example, farm carts and fencing. Today{farming}is more mechanised and most of the machinery is made from{metal. Over the years the Wheelwright and Joinery Business, which has existed in the area since 1740, has gradually changed to general household joinery, reshafting hand tools and making items of furniture. In recent years, a small{metal business developed. This business uses metals to make a variety of things, including pig troughs. --------------------------------------
